pho.name: Phở
pho.description: Phở delivers a complex, rich flavor structure. The highlight of the dish is the fragrant broth, simmered for hours with beef bones, onion and roasted ginger, along with warm spices like star anise and cinnamon.

comtam.description: Cơm Tấm is a signature dish of Saigon cuisine with rich, harmonious flavors. Broken rice has small grains that are soft, chewy and fragrant.
